name: 3dclust
author: AFNI Developers
description: Performs simple-minded cluster detection in 3D datasets

inputs.description: Cluster connection radius in millimeters.
inputs.name: Radius in millimeters

inputs.description: Minimum cluster volume in micro-liters or minimum number of voxels if negative.
inputs.name: Minimum cluster volume

inputs.description: Input dataset(s). More than one allowed, but only the first sub-brick of the dataset.
inputs.name: Input dataset(s)

inputs.description: 1st nearest-neighbor clustering (faces touching).
inputs.name: First nearest neighbor clustering flag

inputs.description: 2nd nearest-neighbor clustering (edges touching).
inputs.name: Second nearest neighbor clustering flag

inputs.description: 3rd nearest-neighbor clustering (corners touching).
inputs.name: Third nearest neighbor clustering flag

inputs.description: Use the signed voxel intensities for calculations.
inputs.name: No absolute value flag

inputs.description: Write out only the total nonzero voxel count and volume for each dataset.
inputs.name: Summarize flag

inputs.description: Suppress printout of the totals.
inputs.name: No summarize flag

inputs.description: Print out a progress report to stderr as computations proceed.
inputs.name: Verbosity flag

inputs.description: Write output in 1D format (default).
inputs.name: 1D format flag

inputs.description: Do not write output in 1D format.
inputs.name: No 1D format flag

inputs.description: Suppress all non-essential output.
inputs.name: Quiet flag

inputs.description: Transform output xyz-coordinates from TLRC to MNI space if the input dataset has the +tlrc view.
inputs.name: MNI space transformation flag

inputs.description: Clusters will be formed only from contiguous voxels that also have the same value.
inputs.name: Isovalue clustering flag

inputs.description: Clusters will be formed from each distinct value in the dataset; spatial contiguity will not be used.
inputs.name: Isomerge clustering flag

inputs.description: Use an internal mask from the dataset to eliminate voxels before clustering.
inputs.name: Inmask flag

inputs.description: Write a new dataset that is a copy of the input, but with all voxels not in a cluster set to zero; provide a prefix for the new dataset.
inputs.name: Prefix for new dataset

inputs.description: Write a new dataset that is an ordered mask where the largest cluster is labeled '1', the next largest '2', and so forth.
inputs.name: Order mask prefix

inputs.description: Turn the output of '-savemask' into a binary (0 or 1) mask.
inputs.name: Binary mask flag

output-files.description: New dataset with clusters set to zero based on prefix.
output-files.name: Prefixed output dataset

output-files.description: Ordered mask dataset based on savemask prefix.
output-files.name: Ordered mask output dataset
